creditline: Gift of Janice Lea Lurie in memory of Ernest J. Lurie
inscription:
Mark, Inscription and Signature

Bottom center image, in black glaze: [DE(?)SYNTAX LOSING HIS WAY/THE DONKIE, S BRAY, D, AND LO THE SOUND/AWAK, D HIM FROM HIS THAUGHT-PROFOUND/AND AS HE STAR, D AND LOOK, D AROUND/HE SAID OR ELSE HE SEEM, D TO SAY/I FIND THAT I HAVE LOST MY WAY]
markings:
On bottom, in blue glaze: [(organic hanging pendants flanking) 1911/(buffalo)/BUFFALO/POTTERY/EMERALD/DELDARE/ WARE/UNDERGLAZE]

On bottom, in brown glaze: [Soto(?)]

On bottom, in blue: [6]; [4 (crossed out in brown)]
signed: On front, below poem, in brown glaze: [M. Gerhardt]
title: Plate with Man on Horseback
